story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in Seoul, Keyable Korea specializes in creating unforgettable experiences for international visitors. We combine local expertise with global service standards to deliver personalized travel and medical tourism solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To make Korea accessible and enjoyable for travelers worldwide, providing seamless, safe, and memorable experiences through personalized service and local expertise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

questions.q1: What areas in Korea do you cover?
questions.a1: We cover all major destinations including Seoul, Busan, Jeju Island, Gyeongju, and rural areas. Custom itineraries can include any location in South Korea.
questions.q2: Do you offer medical tourism packages?
questions.a2: Yes, we partner with JCI-accredited hospitals and clinics for various procedures including health checkups, cosmetic surgery, dental care, and specialized treatments. All packages include medical interpretation and post-procedure support.
questions.q3: What languages do your guides speak?
questions.a3: Our licensed guides are fluent in English, Indonesian (Bahasa), Korean, and other languages upon request. We ensure clear communication throughout your journey.
questions.q4: How do I book a tour or service?
questions.a4: Simply fill out our inquiry form with your preferences and travel dates. Our team will contact you within 24 hours with a customized proposal and quote.
questions.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a5: We accept international bank transfers, credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), and PayPal. A deposit is required to confirm bookings, with the balance due before arrival.
questions.q6: Can you help with visa requirements?
questions.a6: Yes, we provide guidance on visa requirements and can issue invitation letters for medical tourism purposes. Visa policies vary by nationality, so we'll advise based on your specific situation.
